transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: IndiaMART Singh aur aapki baat hui thi pehle.
Executive: Ji mam, meri baat kal 30vi baat ho rahi thi jinke dwara maine IndiaMART ka ye subscription liya hua tha.
Executive: Sir aapko na itna aap na itne panic mat hoiye main aapko batati hu aapki abhi usse baat nahi hui Janvi se meri baat nahi hui.
Customer: Mam maine apne star pe pura Janvi jo.
Executive: Enterprises ha.
Customer: Ha unse real se hi baat ho gayi aur ye mere sath fraud ho hi chuka hai.
Executive: Nahi aap.
Customer: Ye confirm ho chuka hai mam mere star pe ki mere sath ye fraud ho chuka hai ye.
Executive: Nahi nahi Aditya suno maine na apni side se apni jo legal team hai hamari jo legal team hai jo aapka aur aapke.
Customer: Mam mera ab ye ho sakta hai mam mam ye agar aap kara sake mujhe is cheez mein abhi kuch samajh aisa aa nahi raha hai jo maine aapko QR share kiya hai na maine aapko QR wagera share kiye hue hai na jispe maine payment kiya hai.
Executive: Ha aapne mujhe payment wale screenshot share kiye hai.
Customer: Unke matlab jo bank mein maine UPI ID se transaction kiye un wo ID ki mujhe jinpe UPI ID transaction kiya hai unke account ki mujhe jankari kaise mil sake to matlab jaise unko account block kar sake ya unke bare mein jankari kar sake ye keh sake ki ye aapne ₹10000 ya ₹47000 kaise aa sakte hai cyber cyber crime ka hai.
Executive: Ye main aapko.
Customer: Ye matlab ab apan is cheez mein kya kar sakte hai mam thoda.
Executive: Matlab aapki unse baat ho gayi Janvi Enterprises mein.
Customer: Ji mam ho chuki hai.
Executive: Unhone kya bola?
Customer: Ye mere naam se bilkul koi fraud chala raha hai wo mera GST use kar raha hai mera naam use kar raha hai pura mera unka bhi Mahendra Pratap naam hai aur jinse meri baat hui thi wo usne apna naam Mahendra Pratap bataya tha.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ragini Shukla naam hai.
Executive: Ragini Shukla. Aur jo uska Ragini Shukla hi to hai sir.
Customer: Ragini Shukla aur usne usne jo number bheja tha matlab jo GST number hai ekdam genuine hai aur jo vyakti hai na wo IndiaMART pe registration matlab inka registration nahi hai matlab wo inke through matlab kya kar raha hai kya nahi usne mera number kahan se aaya kahan se nahi ye nahi malum wo to online mera dala hua hai sab jagah.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: To matlab wahi cheez dekh raha hu ki.
Executive: Main batati hu.
Customer: Jo original jaise main hu ek tarike se aap mujhe maniye.
Customer: Main Janvi hu Janvi Enterprises se mera firm hai aur matlab samne wala koi vyakti mera naam ka pura same bio data use karke aur koi aur kar raha hai aur jiske sath fraud hua matlab uski mujhse baat ho chuki hai matlab ek tarike se meri meri mujhse matlab wo baat ho chuki hai real jo hai wo bhi apne contact mein nikala hai matlab usme ab jab nikala to.
Executive: Wo aath saal se wo members hai maine bhi check kiya hai wo aath saal se IndiaMART pe members hai.
Customer: Wo 15 15 saal 15 saal se wo kam kar rahe hai.
Executive: 15 saal se wo kam kar rahe hai but IndiaMART pe bhi wo aath saal se hai.
Customer: Ab mam wo sahi hai par wo wo party genuine jo registration hai aur ye mere sath kisi aur ne matlab unka naam laga ke pura fraud hua hai.
Customer: Ab kaise ho sakta hai mam aap isme kya aisa kar sakte hai wo dekh lijiye main kya abhi isme hopeless andar se itna hua hu ki us payment payment mam chote to hai nahi ye.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul chota nahi hai aur.
Customer: ₹47000 hai mam.
Executive: Ji ha jitna hamare end se ho sakega hum wo kar rahe hai maine aapki sari details jo bhi details thi jo aapne mujhe share ki hai wo maine PDF bana ke aage apni team ko forward bhi karwa diya hai aapka jo concern tha maine wo bhi likh liya hai.
Executive: Theek hai ab aapka.
Executive: Buyer supplier wala jo hai wo aapka dekh lega apne aap aap mujhe bas itna karna ki main aapko ek mail send karungi apni side se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ha bas aap wo usme kya puchta hai sir.
Executive: Feedback ke liye aap usme yes kar dena ha main ye maine close karke aage jo meri team hai wo.
Customer: Yes mam mam kya cheez hai usme matlab mam samajh nahi pa raha hu.
Executive: Nahi aapko ek mail aayegi aap usme yes kar dena theek hai.
Customer: Ha uska kya rahega matlab.
Executive: Satisfied wala satisfied wala uska ye rahega ki aapka concern mere paas aa gaya hai aur maine aapke concern par kam kiya hai.
Customer: Ji to wo aage team ko jayega team apna kam karegi.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Aur aap next time pe jab.
Customer: Mam abhi to ye matlab mam mam ye bataiye ek bar ye concern abhi aise jayega ya matlab bana rahega.
Executive: Ye concern meri side se aage forward ho jayega.
Customer: Ab matlab aapki side se jaise aage forward ho gaya matlab ispe kam chalu hoga ya matlab ye matlab band ho chuka hai matlab meri inquiry khatam ho chuki hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi inquiry khatam hone wala nahi hai inquiry aage generate hui hai.
Customer: Ji mam bataiye kar dijiye usme mam fir kar dunga.
Executive: Main abhi aapko ek se do minute mein.
Customer: Kya mam abhi itna andar se wo hu ki.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap bilkul pareshan mat hoiye aapka sara concern jitna bhi aage jayega aisa kuch nahi hai aap IndiaMART ke member ho IndiaMART is cheez ka pura dhyan rakhta hai ki hamare client ko kisi bhi tarike ka koi issue na aaye.
Executive: Theek hai wo main aage revert back karungi fir wo mujhe revert karenge main wo aapko bataungi sir aur ho sakta hai ki unki side se aapke paas call bhi aa jaye.
Customer: Aath saal se active hai.
Executive: Ha wo aath saal se IndiaMART pe active hai.
Customer: Ye aath saal se chal rahi hai share kar rahe hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha ji.
Customer: Ji mam aap usse kar dijiye meri Mahendra ji se hi baat ho rahi hai jo original Mahendra ji hai.
Executive: Theek hai main wo karti hu aap mail pe satisfied kar dena.
Customer: Theek hai mam.
Executive: Okay mam.
Customer: Okay. Janvi ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer faced a fraud using IndiaMART's name.

- Wants details of the UPI ID transaction.

- Seeks assistance in blocking fraudulent accounts.



Resolution:

- Executive assured forwarding the concern to legal team.

- Executive will send a satisfaction mail.

- Assured that IndiaMART takes client issues seriously.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to respond to satisfaction email.

- Executive will revert back to the customer.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- fraud, payment, legal team, upi, gst, registration
